Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hcl.currencyexchange.restController.Controller
  • @RestController
@EnableJpaRepositories(basePackages="com.hcl.currencyexchange.repository")
@RequestMapping("/")
public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object

    Controller class

    This class is used to handle all the requests sent by the user.

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.Object> addExchanges​(java.lang.String date, java.lang.String curFrom, java.lang.String curTo, java.lang.Float rate)
      This method is used to handle the POST request to the localhost:8080/exchange/v1/add URL by calling the addExchanges method from the DatabaseManager class.
      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.Object> getExchangeFromDate​(java.lang.String date)
      This method is used to handle the GET request to the localhost:8080/exchange/v1/get/{date} URL by calling the getExchangeFromDate method from the DatabaseManager class.
      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.Object> getExchangeFromDateFromCurrAtCurr​(java.lang.String date, java.lang.String curFrom, java.lang.String curTo)
      This method is used to handle the GET request to the localhost:8080/exchange/v1/get/{date}/{fromCurr} URL by calling the getExchangeFromDateFromCurrAtCurr method from the DatabaseManager class.
      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.Object> getExchangeFromDateWithCurr​(java.lang.String date, java.lang.String curFrom)
      This method is used to handle the GET request to the localhost:8080/exchange/v1/get/{date}/{fromCurr} URL by calling the getExchangeFromDateWithCurr method from the DatabaseManager class.
      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.Object> getExchanges()
      This method is used to handle the GET request to the localhost:8080/exchange/v1/get URL by calling the getExchanges method from the DatabaseManager class.
      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.Object> updateById​(java.lang.Float rate, java.lang.String date, java.lang.String curFrom, java.lang.String curTo)
      This method is used to handle the PUT request to the localhost:8080/exchange/v1/update URL by calling the updateById method from the DatabaseManager class.

    • Method Detail

      • addExchanges

        @RequestMapping(value="/exchange/v1/add",
                method=POST)
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.Object> addExchanges​(@RequestParam("Date")
                                                                              java.lang.String date,
                                                                              @RequestParam("CurFrom")
                                                                              java.lang.String curFrom,
                                                                              @RequestParam("CurTo")
                                                                              java.lang.String curTo,
                                                                              @RequestParam("Rate")
                                                                              java.lang.Float rate)
        This method is used to handle the POST request to the localhost:8080/exchange/v1/add URL by calling the addExchanges method from the DatabaseManager class.
        Parameters:
        date - The date of the transaction. Date format: YYYY-MM-DD.
        curFrom - The currency ISO to be converted (ex. USD, EUR, etc).
        curTo - The currency ISO to convert into (ex. USD, EUR, etc).
        rate - The conversion rate between specified currencies.
        Returns:
        ResponseEntity
